markdownRemark.html: Bryan Kaiser and Michael Haynie plugged my website again on the last episode of the Coldfusionpodcast. This last episode covered the Fusion debug tool for eclipse. If have thought about using a more traditional debugger with ColdFusion, Michael and Bryan give an overview of this new tool. They even managed to pronounce my last name correctly. Thank Guys.

frontmatter.title: Podcast pod changed on my Blog
